original_text: Know ye not, that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death?
korean_text: 무릇 그리스도 예수와 합하여 세례를 받은 우리는 그의 죽으심과 합하여 세례를 받은 줄을 알지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도 예수 안으로 침례를 받은 우리가
